title: Bug 132103: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
OB: When scripting a data set, there are no objects listed under Context in the palette.
EB: When scripting a data set, the palette should provide objects such as 'this', 'row', and 'reportContext' under the Context section. Additionally, other objects available for other methods should also be provided.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new data set and select it.
2. Switch to the script view and choose 'onFetch'.
3. Open the palette and observe the absence of objects under the Context section.
